ygData.subject: Re: Battle in Antarctic
ygData.msgSnippet: OOps, thought your characters were still climbing. Megaton was disturbed that his rockslide did nothing for his Ego. There was a battle going on, he

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

OOps, thought your characters were still climbing.

Megaton was disturbed that his rockslide did nothing for his Ego. There was
a battle going on, he transformed back to his dragon mode and took flight
toward the battle. "You Predacons are pathetic", he yelled broadcasting his
voice over the sounds of battle. His echoing voice resembled Megatrons
virtually exact, he spread his wings and blew a hurricane gust of wind
toward the battlefield to shake up the warriors. The great dragon breathed
deeply into his fire lung and spit towards Starscream. A fireball about four
foot in diameter hurtled toward the bot hot enough to incinerate it's
engines. he swung his tail around at Tankor and EndBringer. "Try not to
scream to loudly as I destroy you all." Megaton had Megatrons cocky
personality but unlike his donor he had the power to back it up.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 13, 2000 9:27 PM
Subject: Re: Battle in Antarctic


> Also, Megaton would be rolling boulders on no-one I think.
> EndBringer's group was engaged in combat with the ambushers, so they
> were on top of the mountain.
>
> ::EndBringer/Scyther/Demise::
>
> EndBringer smiles, jumping up as missiles destroy his 'padestral'. He
> flies down and lands on top of Tankorr, his tentacles instantly
> wrapping around the bot. He laughs as he sends millions of volts of
> electricity through the bot. Even for someone Tankorr's size, the
> shock would produce critical damage.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther frowns as Paralysis crawls toward him. He backs up, his
> scythe ready to sever the Predacon's head.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise roars as Rampage begins to crush his leg, feeling something
> snap. His giant claws slash down and close around the attacker,
> sinking into him.
>
>
>
>
>
